玉の帯: (ごくのおび) - special leather belt used in ceremonial court dress, covered in black lacquer and decorated with stones and jewels
玉の緒: (たまのお) - bead string; thread of life
玉の肌: (たまのはだ) - skin as beautiful as a gem; beautiful skin
玉の膚: (たまのはだ) - skin as beautiful as a gem; beautiful skin
玉の輿: (たまのこし) - palanquin set with jewels; money and social status gained by marrying a rich and powerful man
玉の輿に乗る: (たまのこしにのる) - to marry into a family of rank; to marry money
玉みそ: (たまみそ) - miso ball; bean paste ball
玉串: (たまくし) - {Shinto} branch of a sacred tree (esp. sakaki) with paper or cotton strips attached (used as an offering); sakaki (species of evergreen sacred to Shinto, Cleyera japonica)
玉串奉奠: (たまぐしほうでん) - {Shinto} reverentially offering a branch of the sacred tree
玉串料: (たまぐしりょう) - cash offering made on the occasion of one's visit to a shrine; money offering dedicated to the Shinto gods; fees for offering a branch of the sacred tree to the gods
玉乗り: (たまのり) - balancing on a ball
玉代: (ぎょくだい) - time charge for a geisha
玉体: (ぎょくたい) - the Emperor's person or presence
玉偏: (ぎょくへん) - (as in 珠) kanji "jewel" radical at left (radical 96)
玉入れ: (たまいれ) - ball-toss game, in which balls are thrown into a basket on a high pole (played at sports festivals)
玉味噌: (たまみそ) - miso ball; bean paste ball
玉型: (たまがた) - round; spherical; globe type; lens shape
玉型弁: (たまがたべん) - globe valve; spherical valve; stop valve
玉垣: (たまがき) - fence around a shrine
玉子: (たまご) - (卵 only) eggs/egg/spawn/roe; hen egg; (卵 only) (an expert) in the making; (卵 only) beginning/origin/infancy
玉子とじ: (たまごとじ) - soup or stew over which a beaten egg is poured before serving; egg-bound soup
玉子に目鼻: (たまごにめはな) - cute, white, oval face (appearing as if someone glued eyes and a nose on an egg)
玉子丼: (たまごどんぶり) - bowl of rice topped with boiled eggs
玉子焼: (たまごやき) - rolled egg/rolled omelette (omelet); frying pan for making rolled eggs
玉子焼き: (たまごやき) - rolled egg/rolled omelette (omelet); frying pan for making rolled eggs
玉子綴じ: (たまごとじ) - soup or stew over which a beaten egg is poured before serving; egg-bound soup
玉子豆腐: (たまごどうふ) - tamago dofu; tamago-dofu; steamed egg custard with soup stock, cooked in a square mould
玉形: (たまがた) - round; spherical; globe type; lens shape
玉形弁: (たまがたべん) - globe valve; spherical valve; stop valve
玉手箱: (たまてばこ) - treasure chest (in the story of Urashima Taro)/Urashima's casket/Pandora's box; important secret that is not easily revealed to others
玉摧: (ぎょくさい) - honourable defeat/honorable defeat/honourable death/honorable death/death without surrender; (玉砕 only)  trying but being utterly beaten/being completely rejected when professing one's love
玉整理: (ぎょくせいり) - liquidation of speculative accounts
玉敷き: (たましき) - beautiful (as if adorned with jewels)
玉敷沙蚕: (タマシキゴカイ) - Arenicola brasiliensis (species of lugworm)
玉樟: (タマグス) - Machilus thunbergii (species of laurel)
玉殿: (たまどの) - alias for fox (from a statue in the Inarimae shrine)
玉石: (たまいし) - pebble; round stone; boulder
玉石混交: (ぎょくせきこんこう) - (yoji) mixture of wheat and chaff; mixture of the good and bad; jumble of wheat and tares
玉石混淆: (ぎょくせきこんこう) - (yoji) mixture of wheat and chaff; mixture of the good and bad; jumble of wheat and tares
玉砕: (gyokusai) - derrota honrosa, derrota honrosa, morte honrosa, morte honrosa, morte sem rendição; tentando mas sendo completamente derrotado, sendo totalmente rejeitado ao declarar seu amor
玉砕主義: (ぎょくさいしゅぎ) - (yoji) the principle of honorable death and no surrender
玉突: (たまつき) - billiards/pool; serial collisions (of cars)
玉突き: (たまつき) - billiards/pool; serial collisions (of cars)
玉筋魚: (イカナゴ) - Japanese sand lance (Ammodytes personatus); Pacific sandeel
玉箒: (たまばはき) - broom (esp. one for sweeping a silkworm-raising room on the first Day of the Rat of the New Year); plant used for constructing brooms (e.g. kochia); liquor/alcohol/sake
玉籤: (たまぐし) - {Shinto} branch of a sacred tree (esp. sakaki) with paper or cotton strips attached (used as an offering); sakaki (species of evergreen sacred to Shinto, Cleyera japonica)
玉結び: (たまむすび) - thread knot (end of the thread tied up to a knot)
玉繭: (たままゆ) - dupion (double cocoon formed jointly by two or more silkworms)/dupioni; cocoon
玉藍: (たまあい) - ball of dried, ground, fermented dyer's knotweed leaves
玉虫: (たまむし) - jewel beetle; Chrysochroa fulgidissima; insect with iridescent wings
玉虫色: (たまむしいろ) - iridescent; equivocal/ambivalent; variable meaning/weasel-word/chameleonic interpretation
玉蜀黍: (トーモロコシ) - corn (Zea mays); maize
玉蜀黍畑: (とうもろこしばたけ) - corn field; maize field
玉貝: (タマガイ) - moon snail (Naticidae spp.)/moon shell; Marten's pearl oyster (Pinctada fucata martensii)/Akoya pearl oyster
玉貝科: (たまがいか) - Naticidae; family of molluscs comprising the moon snails
玉蹴り: (たまけり) - (joc)  football (soccer); kick to the groin/kneeing in the testicles
玉鋼: (たまはがね) - steel made from iron sand or black sand (used in sword blades)
玉門: (ぎょくもん) - beautifully decorated gate (euph. for female genitalia)
玉露: (ぎょくろ) - high-quality green tea; (orig. meaning) jewel-like dewdrop
玉音: (ぎょくいん) - the Emperor's voice; beautiful voice/beautiful sound
玉音放送: (ぎょくおんほうそう) - radio broadcast announcing acceptance of the Potsdam Declaration and the end of the war (recording of Hirohito; broadcast Aug. 15, 1945)
玉音盤: (ぎょくおんばん) - recording disc (of the Imperial surrender message)
玉響: (たまゆら) - short time; fleeting moment
玉飾り: (たまかざり) - New Year ornament (usu. of straw, fern leaves, seaweed and bitter orange fruit, and hung at the entrance of a home)
王: (ou) - rei, rei, governante, soberano, monarca; magnata, magnata, campeão, mestre
王その人: (おうそのひと) - none other than the king
王のように: (おうのように) - like a lord
王を立てる: (おうをたてる) - to enthrone a king
王を詰める: (おうをつめる) - to checkmate the king
王位継承者: (おういけいしょうしゃ) - heir to a throne
